content: They should keep him on, why let him leave before he completely embarrasses fox news. Of course he should not get his regular salary, but supporting donald trump is its own reward so he should have no problem with this. Those advertisers are as despicable as he is, they kept paying for ads on fox throughout their alternative facts. And are they taking their ads off the rest of the network or just his show? Empty gesture which just shows they are complicit in right wing racism, destruction and failure.
